ORDER
PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
670 A.2d 127
Mary FERRACCIO, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (INTECH CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC.)
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 25, 1995.
Decided Dec. 15, 1995.
